position_empty: This function will check to see if a given position enters into collision with any instance with a valid collision mask at the given position.

{ANY_CODE} var xx, yy;
xx = random(room_width);
yy = random(room_height);
if position_empty(xx, yy)
{nbsp_x3}{
{nbsp_x3}instance_create_layer(xx, yy, "Bullets", obj_Bomb);
{nbsp_x3}}
This will check a random position somewhere in the room for a collision and if there is none it will create an instance of obj_Bomb.
